type.name: org.gradle.jvm.JarBinarySpec
type.description: Definition of a Jar file binary that is to be built by Gradle.

method.description: Sets the API jar file output for this binary.

method.name: setJarFile
method.description: Sets the jar file output for this binary.

property.description: The API jar file output for this binary.

property.name: id
